name: Classic Cheeseburger
description: Juicy beef patty with cheddar, lettuce, tomato, and house sauce.

name: Hyderabadi Biryani
description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked with tender chicken and spices.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce, parmesan cheese, croutons, and caesar dressing.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Warm chocolate cake with a molten center, served with vanilla ice cream.

name: Mango Lassi
description: Refreshing yogurt-based drink blended with sweet ripe mangoes.

name: Crispy Spring Rolls
description: Vegetable filling wrapped in a crispy pastry shell, served with sweet chili sauce.
